comment.author: 66421761@N04
comment._content:
I doubt this photo was taken in Feb, 2012, probably 1972; the plane was disposed of in 1988.  I was in Coast Guard in 1972 and stationed in Elizabeth City NC as was CG 1351 (the plane in the picture).  
CG 1351 was the first plane to be used on "Great Lakes Ice Patrol" (Project Icewarn, COAST GUARD/NASA/NOAA), in 1975; we flew out of Nasa's Lewis Research Center, Clevland Ohio.

comment.author: 30194653@N06
comment._content: Thanks for commenting.   Yes, the photo is from Hurricane Agnes in 1972.  The statement "This photo was taken on February 20, 2012 using a Nikon D800." is automatically added by Flickr from metadata describing when the scan was actually created (rather than the original image).
